name: Infiltration Trench (IT)
description: This wizard create a Infiltration Trench

connectors.name: Contributing impervious catchment to Catch basin
Contributing impervious catchment to Aggregate storage

parameters.name: pipe_start_invert
parameters.question: Invert of the start of the underdrain pipe

parameters.name: native_soil_n_y
parameters.question: Number of soil layers of the native soil

parameters.name: native_soil_K_s
parameters.question: Native soil hydraulic conductivity

parameters.name: native_soil_alpha
parameters.question: Native soil Van Genuchten Î± parameter

parameters.name: native_soil_n
parameters.question: Native soil Van Genuchten n parameter

parameters.name: native_soil_theta_res
parameters.question: Native soil residual moisture content

parameters.name: native_soil_theta_sat
parameters.question: Native soil saturated moisture content

parameters.name: length
parameters.question: Length

parameters.name: width
parameters.question: Width

parameters.name: TimeSeriesFileName
parameters.question: Precipitation file name

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.question: Simulation Start Date

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.question: Simulation End Date

parameters.name: Catchment_area
parameters.question: The area of impervious contributing area

parameters.name: Catchment_slope
parameters.question: The slope of the impervious contributing area

parameters.name: Catchment_Manning_coefficient
parameters.question: Effective Manning's roughness coefficient of the impervious contributing area

parameters.name: Catchment_mean_width
parameters.question: The average width of the impervious contributing area perpendicular to the flow direction

parameters.name: storage_layer_height
parameters.question: Depth of the Aggregate

parameters.name: aggregate_porosity
parameters.question: Porosity

parameters.name: ManningCoeff_aggregate
parameters.question: Manning's roughness coefficient of the drainage pipe

parameters.name: diameter_aggregate
parameters.question: Underdrain pipe diameter

parameters.name: length_aggregate
parameters.question: The length of the underdrain pipe

parameters.name: depth_to_groundwater
parameters.question: The depth to groundwater

parameters.name: Catch_Basin_Depth
parameters.question: The catch basin invert from the surface

parameters.name: Catch_Basin_Area
parameters.question: The base area of the catch basin

criteria.name: pipe_start_invert_crit
criteria.errormessage: The invert of underdrain pipe cannot be lower than the bottom surface of the aggregate layer

criteria.name: pipe_start_invert_neg_crit
criteria.errormessage: The invert of underdrain pipe must be greater than zero

criteria.name: length_aggregate_crit
criteria.errormessage: The lenght of the underdrain pipe must be greater than zero!

criteria.name: Catch_Basin_Depth_crit
criteria.errormessage: The catch basin invert from the surface must be greater than zero!

criteria.name: Catch_Basin_Area_crit
criteria.errormessage: The base area of the catch basin must be greater than zero!

criteria.name: Catchment_area_crit
criteria.errormessage: The area of impervious contributing area must be greater than zero!

criteria.name: Catchment_slope_crit
criteria.errormessage: The slope of the impervious contributing area must be greater than zero!

criteria.name: Catchment_Manning_coefficient_crit
criteria.errormessage: The effective Manning's roughness coefficient of the impervious contributing area must be greater than zero!

criteria.name: Catchment_mean_width_crit
criteria.errormessage: The average width of the impervious contributing area perpendicular to the flow direction must be greater than zero!

criteria.name: width_crit
criteria.errormessage: The width must be greater than zero!

criteria.name: depth_to_groundwater_crit
criteria.errormessage: The groundwater depth must be greater than zero!

criteria.name: length_crit
criteria.errormessage: The length must be greater than zero!

criteria.name: native_crit
criteria.errormessage: The groundwater depth must be greater than aggregate layer depth.

criteria.name: aggregate_porosity_crit
criteria.errormessage: The porosity must be greater than zero!

criteria.name: native_soil_theta_sat_crit
criteria.errormessage: The native soil saturated moisture content must be greater than the residual moisture content

criteria.name: native_soil_theta_res_crit
criteria.errormessage: The native soil resudual moisture content must be non-negative

criteria.name: native_soil_theta_sat_2_crit
criteria.errormessage: The native soil saturated moisture content cannot be greater than 1.00!
